mapper.select: SELECT q.question_no questionNo , q.test_no testNo , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle , e.example_no exampleNo , e.example_idx exampleIdx , e.example_title exampleTitle , e.example_ox exampleOx FROM question q INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no WHERE q.question_no = #{questionNo} ORDER BY question_idx ASC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT t.test_no testNo , t.test_title testTitle , q.question_no questionNo , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle FROM test t INNER JOIN question q ON t.test_no = q.test_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY question_no ASC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
